org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.trafficblocks.tmc
Class RDSTMCParser

java.lang.Object
  org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.trafficblocks.tmc.RDSTMCParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
TMCfromNMEAFilter.TMCListener
public class RDSTMCParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements TMCfromNMEAFilter.TMCListener

This class parses received binary RDS-TMC messages and hands them over for further processíng.
If multiple receivers exist, each one of them must have it´s own instance of this class as we need to store state-information about the local radion-station to correctly interpret messages.

Author:
Marcus Wolschon

handleGroup8A

protected void handleGroup8A(boolean aB0,
                             boolean aTp,
                             int aPty,
                             int aX,
                             int aBlock3,
                             int aBlock4)
Handle messages of type 8A (traffic-messages).

Parameters:
aB0 - the B0-bit
aTp - the Tp-bit
aPty - the Pty-value
aX - (X4-X0) the group-specific bits of block2
aBlock3 - third block of the 4 blocks of a tmc-message
aBlock4 - fourth block of the 4 blocks of a tmc-message
